=== Roadmap for Quantal Quetzal ===
This page is to serve as a development roadmap for the next version of Xubuntu.
<nowiki>[[http://status.ubuntu.com/ubuntu-quantal/group/topic-quantal-flavor-xubuntu.html|Click here to see the current status of development.]]</nowiki>
